name: Light of Grace
flavorText: "The guttering flame within this ornate Xiansai brazier burns with a cold, dim light. In fact, the Light of Grace actually draws warmth from its surroundings to increase its dull luminance, a rather simple magical effect that some sly wizard might well coopt to increase her powers." —Isendra the Sorceress
